choiceresponse.label: Which of the following methods will let you place an interactive element into an edX course?

checkboxgroup.choice: Inserting the code directly into a Raw HTML component.
Storing a page in Files & Uploads and inserting it via iframe.
Storing a page somewhere else on the internet and inserting it via iframe.

div.p: All of these methods can work! However, the last one in particular needs extra testing - some pages can be iframed, some cannot.
